import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{useState}from'react';import{NavBar}from'./navbar.js';import{Footer}from'./footer.js';import'./assets/styles/actions.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function Actions(){const[hoveredAction,setHoveredAction]=useState('');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavBar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{id:"mainTextActions",children:"Try one of the following actions"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"cardsSection",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Cards,{setHoveredAction:setHoveredAction})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardText,{hoveredAction:hoveredAction})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});}function Cards(_ref){let{setHoveredAction}=_ref;let actions=['Custom Page','Bad request','404','Upload File','Delete file','Calculations'];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:actions.map(action=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{action:action,setHoveredAction:setHoveredAction},action))});}function Card(_ref2){let{action,setHoveredAction}=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"cards",to:definePath(action),onMouseEnter:()=>setHoveredAction(action)// Definir l'action survolee
,onMouseLeave:()=>setHoveredAction('')// Reinitialiser le contenu quand l'action n'est plus survolee
,children:action});}function definePath(action){const paths={'Custom Page':'/actions/custom_page','Bad request':'/actions/bad_request','404':'/actions/coucousalut','Upload File':'/actions/uploader','Delete file':'/actions/delete_file','Calculations':'/actions/calulations'};return paths[action];}function CardText(_ref3){let{hoveredAction}=_ref3;// Messages à afficher pour chaque carte
const messages={'Custom Page':'This will create a custom page by asking you personal information.','Bad request':'This simulates a bad request.','404':'This displays a 404 error page by accessing a bad URL.','Upload File':'This lets you upload a file to the server.','Delete file':'This lets you delete a file from the server.','Calculations':'Perform some calculations here.'};// Afficher le message correspondant à l'action hoverée
